title: BTC Calm Before the Storm? Analyst Eyes Late-2025 Rally
body: TL;DR Bitcoin holds steady near $115,500, with analysts expecting sustainable growth before a 2025 overheated phase. Sell-Side Risk Ratio drops below 0.1%, showing low selling pressure and continued accumulation among holders. Analysts watch $117K closely as $3B in shorts could be liquidated, fueling a stronger rally. Market Sentiment and Long-Term Outlook Bitcoin traded at around $115,500 at press time, unchanged on the day, with a 3% gain over the week. Daily trading volume reached $44.3 billion. Analysts describe the market as steady, though momentum remains muted. Daan Crypto Trades observed , “The market has now been 10 months since the last period where it was truly overheated.” He noted the last overheated phase came after the election, when Bitcoin and altcoins surged immediately. He added that the current market is a “slow grind up” with neutral sentiment and little new retail activity. Looking ahead, he expects another overheated phase toward the end of 2025, but added, “If we end up taking a different route and extend the cycle into 2026, I’ll simply be patient for a little longer.” Funding rate data from Coinglass shows Bitcoin and major altcoins trading in a balanced state over the past year. Funding rates, which reflect the cost of holding long or short futures positions, often signal overheated or fearful trading when extreme. Source: Daan Crypto Trades/X For most of the year, funding has hovered around neutral or slightly positive levels, with only short bursts of high numbers. This suggests traders aren’t aggressively chasing rallies at the moment. With no prolonged extremes, neither Bitcoin nor altcoins are going through extensive highs or lows, supporting the notion that the market may be consolidating in a healthy manner. On-Chain Data Points to Accumulation Ali Martinez reported that Bitcoin’s Sell-Side Risk Ratio has dropped below 0.1%, saying this level “often signals local bottoms, accumulation phases, and low sell pressure.” The metric compares realized profits and losses, and a reading this low shows that few holders are securing gains. Bitcoin $BTC Sell-Side Risk Ratio just dropped below 0.1%. This level often signals local bottoms, accumulation phases, and low sell pressure. pic.twitter.com/lbP8JOe8Of — Ali (@ali_charts) September 16, 2025 Past drops below the same threshold in 2023, 2024, and early 2025 matched phases where Bitcoin consolidated before recovering . This pattern suggests current market conditions favor accumulation as selling pressure remains low. Key Levels and Liquidation Risks CryptoWZRD described the latest daily close as indecisive but sees room for a bullish impulse toward $120,000 ahead of rate-cut sentiment from the Federal Reserve. They cautioned that “a move below $114,800 would keep Bitcoin weak.” On intraday charts, BTC pushed above $117,000, which could open another trade setup if sustained. At the same time, Kyle Chassé warned that “$3B in shorts will be liquidated when $BTC hits $117K.” Exchange liquidation data shows a large cluster of short positions just above the current price, suggesting that if Bitcoin moves higher, a wave of forced liquidations could add fuel to the rally. The post BTC Calm Before the Storm? Analyst Eyes Late-2025 Rally appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Fidelity Announces Shocking Figures: Bulls Will Buy Nearly Half of Bitcoin (BTC) Supply by This Date!
body: While institutional accumulation in Bitcoin continues at a rapid pace, Fidelity stated that the supply shortage may deepen as institutional adoption increases. At this point, Fidelity Digital Assets said in a new report that long-term Bitcoin holders and institutional companies will own 42 percent of the total circulating Bitcoin by 2032 and will take it out of circulation. Fidelity stated that approximately 28% of the total Bitcoin supply will effectively disappear from circulation by the end of 2025. The report stated that long-term holders refer to people who have not moved Bitcoin from their wallets for at least 7 years. Addresses that have been dormant for over seven years and institutional Bitcoin holding companies will hold over 6 million Bitcoins by the end of this year. This figure represents 28% of Bitcoin's total supply of 21 million. “Moreover, by 2032, their holdings will reach 8.3 million Bitcoins. This corresponds to 42% of the circulating supply.” Fidelity finally stated that this forecast does not include Bitcoin purchases by newly publicly traded companies, adding that the supply shortage could worsen if new companies also start stockpiling BTC. Analysts said, “The decrease in Bitcoin circulation will create a supply shock in the market. This will have a positive impact on the rise of BTC.” *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Fidelity Announces Shocking Figures: Bulls Will Buy Nearly Half of Bitcoin (BTC) Supply by This Date!

title: SharpLink’s Astounding ETH Holdings: A Strategic Investment Power Play
body: BitcoinWorld SharpLink’s Astounding ETH Holdings: A Strategic Investment Power Play Nasdaq-listed SharpLink Gaming (SBET) recently made headlines with two significant financial announcements: a major share buyback and its substantial SharpLink ETH holdings . These moves signal a clear strategic direction for the company, blending traditional financial maneuvers with a bold stance in the digital asset space. What’s Behind SharpLink’s Strategic Share Buyback? SharpLink Gaming, a strategic investor in Ethereum, announced on X that it has repurchased one million of its own shares. This action is not a standalone event but part of a larger, ambitious $1.5 billion share buyback plan. To date, the company has already acquired a total of 1.94 million shares under this program. Boosting Shareholder Value: Share buybacks often aim to reduce the number of outstanding shares, which can increase earnings per share (EPS) and potentially drive up the stock price. Confidence in Future Growth: Such a significant buyback signals that the company’s management believes its shares are undervalued, reflecting strong confidence in its future prospects and financial health. Capital Allocation Strategy: It represents a strategic decision to return capital to shareholders while optimizing the company’s capital structure. This commitment to its own stock underscores a belief in SharpLink’s core business, even as it navigates the volatile world of cryptocurrency investments. Unpacking SharpLink’s Astounding ETH Holdings Beyond the share buyback, SharpLink’s other major announcement truly captured the market’s attention: its impressive SharpLink ETH holdings . The company holds a staggering 838,000 ETH, which was valued at approximately $3.86 billion as of September 14. This positions SharpLink as a significant player in the institutional adoption of Ethereum. Such a substantial investment in a single cryptocurrency highlights several key aspects of SharpLink’s forward-thinking strategy: Diversification into Digital Assets: While SharpLink is a gaming company, its significant ETH position shows a clear intent to diversify its asset base into high-growth, albeit high-risk, digital assets. Long-Term Bullish Stance: Holding such a large quantity of Ethereum suggests a long-term bullish outlook on the cryptocurrency’s potential, anticipating continued growth and utility. Strategic Investor Role: SharpLink isn’t just buying; it’s positioning itself as a strategic investor, potentially leveraging its holdings for future ventures or yield generation within the Ethereum ecosystem. The sheer scale of these SharpLink ETH holdings makes the company’s financial strategy particularly unique in the Nasdaq-listed space. Why SharpLink’s Dual Strategy Matters for Investors SharpLink’s simultaneous share buyback and substantial SharpLink ETH holdings present a fascinating case study for investors. It showcases a company balancing traditional financial stewardship with an aggressive foray into the future of finance. For investors, this dual approach means: Potential for Dual Growth Drivers: Shareholders could benefit from both the traditional uplift of a share buyback and the potential appreciation of a significant cryptocurrency portfolio. Increased Risk Exposure: While Ethereum offers immense potential, it also comes with significant volatility. This introduces a higher level of market risk to SharpLink’s overall financial profile. Transparency and Disclosure: SharpLink’s open announcement of its ETH holdings contributes to greater transparency, allowing investors to make more informed decisions about the company’s risk-reward profile. Understanding the implications of these moves is crucial for anyone considering an investment in SBET. The Future Outlook for SharpLink and Its ETH Holdings The path forward for SharpLink Gaming will undoubtedly be shaped by the performance of its core business and, significantly, by its massive SharpLink ETH holdings . As the cryptocurrency market evolves, so too will the value and strategic importance of these digital assets to the company. SharpLink’s decision to embrace Ethereum as a core asset could pave the way for other traditional companies to follow suit, especially as regulatory clarity and institutional infrastructure for digital assets continue to mature. This makes SharpLink a company to watch, not just in gaming, but in the broader intersection of traditional finance and the crypto world. In conclusion, SharpLink Gaming’s recent announcements paint a picture of a company with a bold and innovative financial strategy. By combining a substantial share buyback with massive SharpLink ETH holdings , the company is positioning itself for potential growth in both conventional and emerging markets. This dual approach offers intriguing possibilities for investors, while also highlighting the inherent risks of such a diversified and forward-looking portfolio. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is SharpLink Gaming’s main business? SharpLink Gaming (SBET) is a Nasdaq-listed company, primarily involved in the gaming sector. However, it has also strategically invested in digital assets like Ethereum. How many shares did SharpLink repurchase? SharpLink announced the repurchase of one million of its own shares, as part of a larger $1.5 billion share buyback plan, bringing the total acquired shares to 1.94 million to date. What is the value of SharpLink’s ETH holdings? SharpLink holds 838,000 ETH, which was valued at approximately $3.86 billion as of September 14. Why is SharpLink investing so heavily in Ethereum? SharpLink’s significant investment in Ethereum suggests a long-term bullish outlook on the cryptocurrency’s potential for growth and utility, and a strategic move to diversify its asset base into digital assets. What are the potential risks of SharpLink’s ETH holdings? While Ethereum offers immense potential, it is also subject to significant market volatility. This introduces a higher level of risk to SharpLink’s overall financial portfolio. Did you find this analysis of SharpLink’s financial strategy insightful? Share this article with your network on social media to spark conversations about traditional companies venturing into significant cryptocurrency investments! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum’s institutional adoption. title: 3 Altcoins on Track to Test Critical Resistance Levels This Week
Coinbase Defends Stablecoins Against Banking Threat Claims, Says ‘Math Doesn’t Add Up’
body: Coinbase published a comprehensive defense against banking industry claims that stablecoins threaten traditional financial stability, arguing the “deposit erosion” narrative is a “ myth ” designed to protect banks’ $187 billion annual payment processing monopoly. The exchange released research titled “ Beyond the Deposit Debate ,” challenging Treasury estimates of $6 trillion in potential deposit outflows from yield-bearing stablecoins. Research Challenges Banking Industry’s Deposit Flight Claims The defense comes as five major U.S. banking trade organizations lobby Congress to tighten GENIUS Act regulations, warning that stablecoin platforms offering competitive yields could trigger mass deposit flight similar to the 1980s money market fund crisis. Citigroup analysts particularly compared current dynamics to those of the 1980s , when money market funds expanded from $4 billion to $235 billion in seven years, draining traditional bank deposits. However, Coinbase argues that banks park $3.3 trillion in Federal Reserve reserves, earning $176 billion risk-free annually rather than extending additional loans, contradicting claims of deposit shortages. The company contends most stablecoin activity occurs internationally, strengthening the U.S. dollar’s global role without significantly affecting domestic deposits. The stablecoin market has grown from $4 billion in 2020 to over $285 billion today, with projections reaching $1 trillion in annual payment volume by 2030 and potentially comprising 10% of the U.S. money supply. Citi executive warns stablecoin interest payments could drain bank deposits like the 1980s crisis amid GENIUS Act loophole concerns. #Stablecoin #Banks https://t.co/aaHxz9bXHM — Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) August 25, 2025 Banks Fight Innovation While Exploring Stablecoin Opportunities Themselves Last month, major banking associations, including the American Bankers Association and Bank Policy Institute, urged Congress to close perceived GENIUS Act loopholes allowing crypto exchanges to offer stablecoin yields. The groups cite Treasury estimates that yield-bearing stablecoins could trigger $6.6 trillion in deposit outflows, fundamentally altering bank funding mechanisms. The banking lobby warns that joint marketing arrangements between issuers and exchanges could accelerate deposit flight during financial stress, reducing credit supply and raising borrowing costs. However, platforms like Coinbase and PayPal continue offering stablecoin yields , arguing that prohibitions apply only to issuers rather than intermediaries. Banking opposition faces contradictions as major institutions simultaneously explore stablecoin opportunities. Citigroup CEO Jane Fraser confirmed the bank is “looking at the issuance of a Citi stablecoin” while developing tokenized deposit services for corporate clients seeking 24/7 settlement capabilities. Earlier in June, JPMorgan also launched JPMD deposit tokens for institutional blockchain payments while CEO Jamie Dimon was questioning its use case . The bank served as lead underwriter for Circle’s IPO, which has climbed over 500% since its $31 offering price. It also appears that some institutions are showing approval to control stablecoins, as seen in the recent Bank of England’s proposal for strict ownership . The bank caps between £10,000 and £20,000 for individuals and £10 million for businesses, which triggered widespread backlash. UK’s central bank wants to cap how much stablecoin people can hold, but crypto groups are fighting back, warning the move could choke innovation and leave Britain trailing rivals. #bankofengland #stablecoins https://t.co/lSNMQrEp7z — Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) September 15, 2025 Critics argue that the approach puts Britain at a disadvantage compared to the U.S. and the European Union, which have embedded stablecoins into their financial systems without such restrictions. Institutional Adoption Accelerates Despite Regulatory Pressure Earlier this month, Fireblocks launched a stablecoin payment network with over 40 institutional participants, including Bridge, Circle, and Zerohash, processing $212 billion in monthly volume. The multi-stablecoin infrastructure supports seamless cross-border transfers and regulatory compliance across different token standards. Research reveals 90% of financial institutions actively use or explore stablecoin integration, with major corporations including Amazon and Walmart reportedly considering stablecoins to reduce transaction fees. Similar to Coinbase, Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan criticized banking complaints about competition , arguing banks should offer better deposit rates instead of “ abusing depositors as a free source of capital for decades .” Average U.S. savings accounts yield 0.6% while stablecoin platforms offer up to 5% returns, creating competitive pressure. Coinbase’s research found no meaningful correlation between stablecoin adoption and deposit flight for community banks over the past five years. Stock price correlations between major banks and crypto firms like Coinbase and Circle remain positive at 14%, indicating investors view stablecoins as complementary rather than competitive. Source: Coinbase Report According to a recent Keyrock projection , stablecoins will capture $1 trillion in annual payment volume by 2030, facilitating 12% of global cross-border flows. Adoption is accelerating globally, with payment giants rushing to adopt crypto payments. Recently, Visa partnered with Yellow Card Financial for stablecoin payments across 20 African countries, while Mastercard enables 3 billion cardholders to purchase crypto through blockchain integration. While banks are standing against adoption, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent supports stablecoin adoption , arguing digital dollars will “expand dollar access globally and increase demand for U.S. Treasuries” as backing assets. The technology offers payments up to 13 times cheaper than traditional banks, with instant settlement, making it suitable for the next generation of financial services. The post Coinbase Defends Stablecoins Against Banking Threat Claims, Says ‘Math Doesn’t Add Up’ appeared first on Cryptonews .

Revolutionary Google AI Payment Protocol Unveiled: Stablecoins Take Center Stage
body: BitcoinWorld Revolutionary Google AI Payment Protocol Unveiled: Stablecoins Take Center Stage Get ready for a significant shift in how we handle digital transactions! Google is stepping into the future of finance with a groundbreaking development: the launch of its revolutionary Google AI payment protocol . This innovative system is designed not only to integrate traditional payment methods but also to embrace the growing world of stablecoins. This move, reported by Fortune, signals Google’s serious commitment to reshaping the global payment landscape. What is the Revolutionary Google AI Payment Protocol? At its core, the Google AI payment protocol represents a powerful fusion of artificial intelligence and financial technology. Imagine a payment system that intelligently processes your transactions, offering flexibility and enhanced security. This protocol is engineered to support both the familiar—credit and debit cards—and the cutting-edge—U.S. dollar-based stablecoins. This dual support is crucial. It bridges the gap between conventional finance and the decentralized digital economy, making it easier for users to choose their preferred method. The integration of AI promises smarter, more efficient, and potentially more secure payment experiences for everyone. The Power of Stablecoins in Google AI Payment Protocol Why stablecoins? These digital currencies are pegged to a stable asset, like the U.S. dollar, minimizing the price volatility often associated with other cryptocurrencies. By incorporating stablecoins, the Google AI payment protocol offers users a reliable digital asset for transactions, combining the benefits of blockchain technology with the stability of fiat currency. This integration opens doors for faster international payments, lower transaction fees, and greater financial inclusion. It’s a strategic move that acknowledges the increasing demand for secure and efficient digital alternatives to traditional banking. Who Are the Key Players Behind This Google AI Payment Protocol? Google isn’t going it alone. To bring this ambitious project to life, they’ve forged powerful alliances with leading entities in both the crypto and traditional finance sectors. These collaborations underscore the project’s serious intent and broad potential impact. Coinbase: A major cryptocurrency exchange, bringing expertise in digital asset management and blockchain integration. Ethereum Foundation: Instrumental in leveraging the Ethereum blockchain, a foundational technology for many stablecoins. Salesforce: A cloud-based software company, likely contributing to the protocol’s enterprise and customer relationship management aspects. American Express: A global financial services corporation, providing invaluable insight into traditional payment networks and consumer behavior. These partnerships ensure a robust, secure, and widely accessible Google AI payment protocol , benefiting from diverse industry strengths. What Are the Potential Benefits of the New Google AI Payment Protocol? The introduction of Google’s AI payment protocol brings a host of exciting advantages for both consumers and businesses. This system is poised to simplify digital transactions and enhance user experience. Enhanced Flexibility: Users can choose between traditional cards and stablecoins, offering more control over their finances. Increased Efficiency: AI-powered processing could lead to faster transaction speeds and streamlined payment flows. Global Accessibility: Stablecoins facilitate easier cross-border payments, potentially reducing costs and delays. Improved Security: Leveraging both Google’s robust security infrastructure and blockchain’s cryptographic properties. Future-Proofing: Google is positioning itself at the forefront of digital finance, adapting to evolving payment trends. This innovation could make everyday payments more seamless and sophisticated. Navigating Challenges and the Future of the Google AI Payment Protocol While the prospects are exciting, launching such a significant initiative comes with its own set of challenges. Regulatory landscapes for stablecoins are still evolving globally, and user adoption will depend on ease of use and trust. Google will need to navigate these complexities carefully. However, with its vast user base and technological prowess, Google is uniquely positioned to overcome these hurdles. The future of the Google AI payment protocol looks promising, potentially setting new standards for how we interact with money in the digital age. It represents a bold step towards a more integrated and intelligent financial ecosystem. In conclusion, Google’s venture into an AI-powered payment protocol with stablecoin support is a game-changer. By bringing together the stability of fiat-pegged digital currencies, the intelligence of AI, and the reach of traditional payment networks, Google is not just launching a new product; it’s ushering in a new era of digital payments. This revolutionary move, backed by strong partnerships, promises a more flexible, efficient, and secure financial future for everyone. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is the main purpose of Google’s new AI payment protocol? A1: The main purpose is to create an advanced payment system that supports both traditional methods (credit/debit cards) and U.S. dollar-based stablecoins, leveraging AI for enhanced efficiency and security. Q2: Which partners are collaborating with Google on this project? A2: Google is collaborating with key partners including Coinbase, the Ethereum Foundation, Salesforce, and American Express. Q3: Why did Google choose to support stablecoins? A3: Stablecoins offer the benefits of blockchain technology, such as speed and lower fees, while maintaining price stability by being pegged to assets like the U.S. dollar, making them suitable for everyday transactions. Q4: How will AI enhance the payment protocol? A4: AI is expected to provide smarter processing, improved security features, and a more efficient, streamlined user experience for all types of transactions. Q5: Will this protocol replace traditional payment methods? A5: No, the protocol is designed to support and integrate traditional payment methods alongside stablecoins, offering users more choice and flexibility rather than replacing existing systems. Did you find this article insightful? Share your thoughts and help spread the word about Google’s exciting leap into the future of payments! Your shares help us bring more crucial insights to the crypto community. title: BITCOIN Act in Focus as Industry Executives and Lawmakers Convene in Washington
body: Strategy co-founder Michael Saylor, Marathon Digital Holdings CEO Fred Thiel, and other leading figures in the crypto industry are set to gather on Capitol Hill today to push for legislation that could create a U.S. strategic bitcoin reserve. Roundtable Scheduled with Lawmakers The event, scheduled for Tuesday morning, will be hosted by Sen. Cynthia Lummis and Rep. Nick Begich, Republican cosponsors of the BITCOIN Act. More than a dozen industry executives are expected to attend, including Strategy co-founder Michael Saylor , Fundstrat CEO Tom Lee, Cardano founder Charles Hoskinson, Bitdeer Chief Strategy Officer Haris Basit, Riot’s Senior Vice President of Public Policy Brian Morgenstern, and Cleanspark CEO Matt Schultz. The roundtable is being organized by The Digital Chamber and its affiliate, the Digital Power Network (DPN). Hailey Miller, DPN’s director of government relations and public policy, underscored the central objective: “The focus will be on ensuring the Strategic Bitcoin Reserve is advanced in a budget-neutral way and building the coalition needed to move the BITCOIN Act forward.” The Bill’s Foundation and Scope The BITCOIN Act, formally titled the "Boosting Innovation, Technology, and Competitiveness through Optimized Investment Nationwide Act," was reintroduced by Sen. Lummis in March. The bill expands on an executive order signed earlier this year by President Donald Trump, which requires that bitcoin and other digital assets seized through criminal or civil proceedings be held in a permanent government fund. The proposed legislation goes a step further, directing the Federal Reserve and Treasury to purchase one million bitcoins using budget-neutral methods. Options floated include reassessing Treasury gold certificates and using tariff revenues, ensuring that the purchases do not burden taxpayers. Key Goals for Today’s Meeting Industry executives are expected to press lawmakers on what has hindered the bill’s progress over the past six months and to identify objections that have stalled momentum. Supporters will also pitch bitcoin as a bipartisan priority, framing it as critical for national security and U.S. economic competitiveness. Miller highlighted the urgency: “There is a lot that’s been done in the digital asset space these last couple of months, and there are a whole lot more items on the agenda. Our real push is to ensure that the BITCOIN Act and a strategic bitcoin reserve remain a priority.” Political Landscape and Next Steps Currently, the bill has backing only from Republican lawmakers, with no Democratic support. For the legislation to advance, hearings before the House Financial Services Committee and Senate Banking Committee will be required, though no dates have yet been scheduled. To reinforce the bipartisan case, DPN plans to circulate a briefing that presents the legislation as a “bipartisan opportunity.” Advocates hope today’s session will help build a broader coalition around the bill. The roundtable could mark a pivotal step in determining whether momentum for the BITCOIN Act can be revived. While challenges remain, industry leaders are expected to make their strongest case yet for establishing a U.S. strategic bitcoin reserve. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice

Santander’s Openbank launches crypto trading for European users
body: Openbank, the digital banking arm of Banco Santander, has launched retail crypto trading for its users in Germany, starting Tuesday, according to a press release published Tuesday. Customers can now buy and sell Bitcoin, Ether, Litecoin, Polygon, and Cardano directly through the bank’s investment platform, with plans to add more tokens over time. Spain is next. The bank confirmed that Spanish customers will get access to the same crypto features in the coming weeks. This rollout comes after the full implementation of the EU’s MiCA regulations, which now provide a legal framework for crypto services across the bloc. The move adds pressure on other European banks to keep up, especially as US institutions, now encouraged by President Donald Trump’s support and new stablecoin legislation , are taking similar steps. Openbank charges flat fee ahead of full rollout Coty de Monteverde, head of crypto at Grupo Santander, said in the statement, “By incorporating the main cryptocurrencies into our investment platform, we are responding to the demand of some of our customers.” Openbank has set a 1.49% trading fee, with a €1 minimum per transaction, and confirmed it will not charge any custody fees. Openbank currently operates in Spain, Germany, Portugal, and the Netherlands. The bank says it could extend crypto trading to all these countries within the year, pending regulatory approval. The announcement also revealed that Santander is looking into launching its own stablecoin, still in early planning. That project was first reported in May. These types of tokens are designed to maintain a fixed value, usually pegged to fiat currencies like the euro or dollar, and are being used more frequently by both consumers and businesses. Stablecoins, while originally used mainly by crypto traders, are now getting broader attention. Many firms have started using them for international money transfers and digital payments, and some investors are turning to them for blockchain-based settlements, including for bond trading. In the US, Trump’s return to the White House and his open endorsement of crypto have pushed American banks to explore their own stablecoin projects. Some are now discussing a possible joint token, as reported by the Wall Street Journal. Earlier this year, World Liberty Financial, owned by the Trump family, launched a new stablecoin called USD1 . Analysts at Standard Chartered recently said that if the stablecoin bill passes in the US, the value of dollar-backed stablecoins could hit $2 trillion by 2028, up from around $250 billion today. BBVA, SocGen and Deutsche Bank move in on euro-backed coins Across Europe, competition is rising. BBVA, one of Spain’s biggest banks and a direct rival to Santander, said in March that it will roll out retail crypto trading once it gets approval from the country’s market supervisor. BBVA already gives access to crypto for clients in Switzerland and Turkey, and is currently testing Visa’s new platform for creating and transferring digital bank tokens. In France, Societe Generale has already issued a euro-pegged stablecoin through its crypto division, joining a small but growing list of banks tokenizing fiat currencies for use on blockchain rails. Meanwhile, in Germany, Deutsche Bank’s DWS Group, together with Flow Traders and Galaxy Digital, is building another euro-backed stablecoin. These moves are part of a broader push by European banks to get ahead of what could become a massive change in how crypto assets are traded and settled. But Santander has been in the game far longer than most of its peers. The bank was one of the first traditional institutions to invest in blockchain startups, putting money into Ripple Labs through its venture arm years ago. It has also participated in cross-industry blockchain initiatives, like Fnality International, which aims to build out payment infrastructure using distributed ledgers. The bank even used blockchain in a payments app nearly ten years ago, long before most major players were talking about Web3. The smartest crypto minds already read our newsletter. Want in? Join them .

title: Revolutionary Robot Factory: MicroFactory’s $30M Innovation Transforms AI Robotics
body: BitcoinWorld Revolutionary Robot Factory: MicroFactory’s $30M Innovation Transforms AI Robotics In the dynamic world of technological advancements, where venture capital often flows towards groundbreaking innovations, a San Francisco-based startup named MicroFactory is capturing significant attention. With a recent $1.5 million pre-seed funding round valuing it at an impressive $30 million, MicroFactory is not just building robots; it’s redefining the very concept of a robot factory . For those closely watching the intersection of tech, investment, and efficiency, this compact yet powerful manufacturing solution presents a compelling narrative of future possibilities, echoing the disruptive spirit often seen in the cryptocurrency space. The Rise of the Compact Robot Factory While many robotics firms pursue grand visions of human-sized automatons or fully automated industrial complexes, MicroFactory has taken a different, arguably more ingenious, path. Their core innovation is a general-purpose, tabletop manufacturing kit, remarkably sized to fit within a dog crate. This isn’t just a miniaturized factory; it’s a paradigm shift in how we approach production. According to Igor Kulakov, co-founder and CEO, the design prioritizes general-purpose functionality without the complexities of humanoid forms. This approach significantly simplifies both hardware and AI robotics development, making advanced manufacturing more accessible. MicroFactory’s system is an enclosed, transparent workstation featuring two robotic arms. This allows real-time observation of the manufacturing process, a stark contrast to hidden factory floors. It’s engineered for high-precision tasks, including: Circuit board assembly Component soldering Intricate cable routing This “factory-in-a-box” concept aims to democratize sophisticated manufacturing, bringing automation capabilities to a wider range of businesses and applications. AI Robotics That Learns from You One of MicroFactory’s most compelling features is its intuitive learning mechanism. Unlike traditional programming methods that can be time-consuming and complex, MicroFactory’s robots can be trained through human demonstration. Users can physically guide the robotic arms through specific motions, allowing the system to learn intricate manufacturing sequences rapidly. Kulakov emphasizes that this hands-on approach is not only faster but also leads to a better understanding by the robot of the required task. This method mirrors the human learning curve, where direct instruction often yields quicker results than abstract coding. The integration of advanced AI models further enhances this learning capability, allowing the robots to refine their movements and optimize processes autonomously. This blend of human-guided learning and artificial intelligence makes MicroFactory’s solution particularly agile and adaptable to diverse manufacturing needs, from electronics assembly to unexpected applications like processing snails for escargot. This human-in-the-loop training represents a significant leap forward in making automation technology user-friendly and efficient. Driving Manufacturing Innovation with MicroFactory Startup The genesis of MicroFactory stems from co-founder Igor Kulakov’s firsthand experience with the challenges of traditional manufacturing. Alongside Viktor Petrenko, he previously ran bitLighter, a company producing portable lighting equipment. Kulakov recounts the difficulties associated with consistently training new employees for precise manufacturing tasks. This bottleneck sparked the idea that advancements in AI could offer a viable solution to automate such intricate work, leading them to seize the opportunity and launch MicroFactory in 2024. Their journey began with a rapid five-month development of a prototype. The market response has been overwhelmingly positive, with hundreds of preorders already secured. These early adopters plan to utilize the machines for a wide array of applications, showcasing the versatility and broad appeal of MicroFactory’s approach to manufacturing innovation . This demonstrates a clear demand for solutions that simplify and accelerate complex production processes. Fueling Growth: MicroFactory’s Automation Technology and Funding MicroFactory’s ambitious vision has quickly attracted significant investment. The company recently closed a $1.5 million pre-seed funding round, which notably included participation from executives at the prominent AI company Hugging Face and renowned investor-entrepreneur Naval Ravikant. This investment round has propelled the young startup to an impressive $30 million post-money valuation, underscoring investor confidence in its disruptive potential. The secured funding will be strategically deployed to scale production, converting the existing prototype into a commercial product ready for shipment within approximately two months. Furthermore, MicroFactory plans to expand its team with key hires and continuously enhance its underlying automation technology and AI models. Kulakov outlines an aggressive growth trajectory, aiming to increase production tenfold each year, starting with 1,000 robots in the first year—a target of about three units per day—demonstrating a strong commitment to scaling their innovative solution. The Future of Manufacturing, One Compact Factory at a Time MicroFactory is not just another robotics company; it represents a bold step towards a future where advanced manufacturing is agile, accessible, and highly intelligent. By focusing on compact, general-purpose robots that learn intuitively from human input, they are addressing critical pain points in traditional production processes. The rapid development, strong market interest, and significant early funding highlight the immense potential of this San Francisco startup to revolutionize how goods are made, from intricate electronics to niche culinary ingredients. As MicroFactory gears up for commercial launch, its innovative approach promises to deliver unparalleled efficiency and adaptability, proving that sometimes, thinking small can lead to the biggest breakthroughs. To learn more about the latest AI market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features and institutional adoption. This post Revolutionary Robot Factory: MicroFactory’s $30M Innovation Transforms AI Robotics first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

Ethereum's Competitor, Solana (SOL), Reaches Over 6 Billion Transaction Capacity Per Day! Here Are the Latest Developments on Solana
body: While crypto markets await the Fed's interest rate cut decision to be announced on Wednesday, Ethereum's rival Solana (SOL) is on the agenda this time. Solana on the Crypto Market's Agenda Ahead of the Fed's Decision Galaxy Investment CEO Michael Novogratz said Solana could become a settlement infrastructure for global finance. Novogratz emphasized that Solana's daily trading capacity of more than 6 billion transactions per day is comparable to the 400-700 million daily trading volume of global securities markets. At its BaseCamp 2025 event, Coinbase’s layer-2 network announced its plan to increase cross-chain interaction with the Solana bridge, while also hinting at a token launch. Pantera Capital founder Dan Morehead announced that Solana is the largest investment in his fund's portfolio, with a value of $1.1 billion. Morehead stated that Solana has outperformed even Bitcoin over the past four years. Additionally, Kyle Samani, Chairman of Nasdaq-listed Forward Industries, announced that the company plans to deploy new funds to support the Solana-based DeFi ecosystem. The general market expectation is that the Fed will cut the rate by 25 basis points. However, a surprise 50 basis point move could increase volatility. In this scenario, SOL/BTC and SOL/ETH pairs could gain traction. SOL, which approached $250 over the weekend, is currently trading around $235. While other major cryptocurrencies remain stable, stocks continue to test new highs. Meanwhile, the Bank of England proposed imposing a £10,000 ($13,600) limit on individuals' dollar-backed stablecoin holdings. Aave CEO Stani Kulechov called the proposal “absurd” and urged the community to oppose the regulations. *This is not investment advice. title: Solana Price Prediction: Unveiling Explosive SOL Growth Towards $500 by 2030
body: BitcoinWorld Solana Price Prediction: Unveiling Explosive SOL Growth Towards $500 by 2030 Are you tracking the dynamic world of cryptocurrencies, specifically the rapid ascent of Solana? The buzz around Solana price prediction is undeniable, with many investors and enthusiasts keenly watching its trajectory. As one of the fastest blockchains, Solana has captured significant attention, prompting questions about its long-term potential. Could SOL truly target $500 in the coming years? This comprehensive guide dives deep into the factors influencing Solana’s future, offering insights into its potential path from 2025 to 2030 and beyond. The Solana Phenomenon: What Makes It Stand Out? Solana emerged as a formidable contender in the blockchain space, often lauded for its high throughput and low transaction costs. Unlike many of its peers, Solana was designed from the ground up to handle a massive volume of transactions, making it a favorite for decentralized applications (dApps), NFTs, and decentralized finance (DeFi) projects. Its unique consensus mechanism, Proof of History (PoH) combined with Proof of Stake (PoS), allows for processing thousands of transactions per second, a crucial advantage in a rapidly expanding digital economy. The network’s ability to scale without sharding has been a significant draw for developers seeking efficient and cost-effective solutions. This technological edge is a primary driver behind optimistic Solana price prediction models, as increased utility and developer adoption naturally translate into demand for the native SOL token. Decoding the SOL Price Trajectory: Key Influencers Understanding the potential future of Solana requires analyzing a multitude of factors that influence its market value. The SOL price is not just a reflection of its technology but also a complex interplay of market sentiment, macroeconomic conditions, and ecosystem developments. Broader Crypto Market Trends: Solana, like most altcoins, is often influenced by the overall market sentiment, particularly Bitcoin’s performance. A bullish Bitcoin market tends to lift altcoins, while a downturn can exert downward pressure. Technological Advancements and Upgrades: Continuous innovation, such as the upcoming Firedancer upgrade designed to further enhance transaction processing capabilities, plays a crucial role. These improvements signal network health and future potential. Ecosystem Growth and Developer Activity: The number of active developers, new dApps launched, and the total value locked (TVL) within Solana’s DeFi ecosystem are vital indicators of adoption and utility. A thriving ecosystem boosts demand for SOL. Institutional Adoption: Increased interest from institutional investors, venture capitalists, and large financial firms can inject significant capital, driving up the SOL price . Partnerships with traditional financial entities also lend credibility. Regulatory Landscape: Evolving cryptocurrency regulations worldwide can impact market sentiment and investor confidence. Favorable regulations can provide clarity and encourage investment, while restrictive measures can cause uncertainty. Network Stability: Past network outages have raised concerns. Solana’s ability to maintain consistent uptime and improve network resilience is critical for sustained growth and investor trust. Solana 2025: Short-Term Outlook and Potential As we look towards Solana 2025 , the short-term outlook is shaped by several immediate catalysts and market dynamics. The cryptocurrency market is cyclical, and 2025 could potentially fall within a post-halving bull run, which historically benefits altcoins like Solana. Key drivers for this period include: Continued DeFi and NFT Expansion: Solana’s low fees and speed make it attractive for emerging DeFi protocols and NFT projects. Sustained growth in these sectors will drive utility. Strategic Partnerships: Collaborations with major brands or technology companies could significantly expand Solana’s reach and use cases. Technological Maturity: The full implementation and stabilization of major upgrades, such as Firedancer, could cement Solana’s position as a leading high-performance blockchain. Based on these factors, many analysts project a positive trajectory for Solana in the near term. While predicting exact figures is challenging, a range of $150 to $300 by the end of 2025 is often discussed, contingent on overall market conditions and Solana’s continued execution. The journey to $500 often begins with strong short-term performance. Year Potential Low Price Potential Average Price Potential High Price 2025 $120 $220 $300 Navigating the Mid-Term: Solana’s Journey to 2026 Extending our view to 2026, Solana’s trajectory will largely depend on its ability to maintain momentum and overcome potential hurdles. By this time, the network’s resilience and decentralization efforts will be under closer scrutiny. The competition among Layer 1 blockchains is intense, and Solana must continue to innovate to retain its market share. Key considerations for 2026 include: Decentralization Efforts: Enhancing the number and geographical distribution of validators to improve network robustness. Cross-Chain Interoperability: Developing stronger bridges and integrations with other major blockchains to facilitate seamless asset transfer and communication. Enterprise Solutions: Attracting more traditional businesses to build on Solana, leveraging its speed and low costs for various enterprise-grade applications. If Solana successfully addresses its scalability and decentralization challenges, and the broader crypto market continues its growth, the SOL price could see steady appreciation. A price range moving towards the $300-$400 mark by the end of 2026 is plausible, setting the stage for more ambitious long-term targets. Solana 2030: The Long-Term Vision and Aspirations The long-term outlook for Solana 2030 is where the conversation around the $500 target truly intensifies. Achieving such a milestone would require Solana to become a dominant force in the blockchain industry, akin to how major tech companies command their respective sectors. This vision hinges on several critical developments: Widespread Adoption: Solana needs to move beyond crypto-native users and see mass adoption across various industries, including gaming, social media, supply chain, and digital identity. Sustained Innovation: The core development team must continue to push boundaries, introducing new features and improvements that keep Solana at the forefront of blockchain technology. Robust Security and Stability: Proving its resilience against attacks and maintaining consistent uptime will be paramount to building long-term trust and attracting institutional capital. Regulatory Clarity: A clear and supportive global regulatory environment would significantly de-risk investments and encourage broader participation. If Solana can successfully navigate these complexities and establish itself as a foundational layer for the internet’s next generation, a SOL price of $500, or even higher, becomes a distinct possibility. This would represent a significant market capitalization, placing Solana among the top-tier global assets. Year Potential Low Price Potential Average Price Potential High Price 2030 $350 $550 $700+ Expert Crypto Forecasts: What Do Analysts Predict? When it comes to the Solana price prediction , various analysts and platforms offer diverse perspectives. These crypto forecast models often leverage technical analysis, fundamental analysis, and machine learning algorithms to project future prices. Here’s a summary of common sentiments: Bullish Outlook: Many analysts are optimistic, citing Solana’s technological advantages, growing ecosystem, and strong developer community. They believe that with continued innovation and market adoption, SOL has significant room for growth, potentially reaching and surpassing the $500 mark by 2030. Moderate Outlook: Some forecasts are more conservative, acknowledging Solana’s strengths but also highlighting potential challenges like network stability issues and intense competition. They project steady growth but perhaps at a slower pace, with targets ranging from $300-$450 by 2030. Bearish Outlook: A minority of analysts express caution, focusing on the risks associated with network centralization concerns, regulatory crackdowns, or a prolonged crypto bear market. These forecasts tend to predict slower growth or even potential declines if critical issues are not addressed. It is important to remember that these are predictions based on current information and assumptions, and the crypto market is known for its volatility. Investors should always conduct their own research and consider multiple sources. Navigating the Challenges and Risks for Solana While Solana’s potential is significant, it’s crucial to acknowledge the challenges and risks that could impact its future growth and SOL price . No investment is without its downsides, and Solana is no exception. Network Stability and Outages: Historically, Solana has experienced several network outages, which can erode trust and deter developers and users. While improvements are being made, consistent uptime is paramount. Centralization Concerns: Critics sometimes point to Solana’s high hardware requirements for validators, which can lead to a more centralized network compared to some peers. Efforts to decentralize further are ongoing. Intense Competition: Solana operates in a highly competitive environment with other Layer 1 blockchains like Ethereum (with its Layer 2 solutions), Avalanche, Polygon, and others, all vying for developer and user adoption. Regulatory Uncertainty: The global regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies is still evolving. Unfavorable regulations, particularly regarding staking or specific token classifications, could negatively impact Solana. Market Volatility: The entire cryptocurrency market is subject to extreme price swings. External macroeconomic factors, global events, and sudden shifts in investor sentiment can drastically affect the SOL price . Addressing these challenges effectively will be key to Solana realizing its ambitious long-term targets and strengthening its position in the blockchain ecosystem. Actionable Insights for Potential Investors For those considering an investment in Solana, or simply curious about its future, here are some actionable insights: Do Your Own Research (DYOR): Never rely solely on price predictions. Understand Solana’s technology, its use cases, the team behind it, and its competitive landscape. Understand Risk Tolerance: Cryptocurrencies are volatile assets. Only invest what you can afford to lose. Consider Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA): Instead of a lump sum investment, consider investing a fixed amount regularly. This strategy can mitigate the impact of market volatility. Stay Informed: Keep up-to-date with Solana’s development updates, ecosystem news, and broader market trends. Follow reputable crypto news sources and official Solana channels. Diversify Your Portfolio: Avoid putting all your capital into one asset. A diversified portfolio can help manage risk. A well-informed approach is crucial when navigating the exciting yet unpredictable world of crypto investments, especially concerning a dynamic asset like Solana. Solana’s Future: A Path of Innovation and Growth In conclusion, the journey for Solana from its current standing to a potential SOL price of $500 by 2030 is undoubtedly ambitious but not without a credible path. Its foundational technology, rapid transaction speeds, and growing ecosystem provide a strong base for future expansion. While challenges such as network stability and competition exist, the Solana team’s commitment to innovation and improvement suggests a proactive approach to these hurdles. The Solana price prediction for 2025, 2026, and 2030 points towards significant growth, driven by increasing utility, institutional interest, and the overall maturation of the crypto market. Whether it hits the $500 mark or even surpasses it, Solana remains a compelling asset for those interested in the future of high-performance blockchain technology. As with all investments, careful consideration and ongoing research are essential. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Solana’s ecosystem and institutional adoption . This post Solana Price Prediction: Unveiling Explosive SOL Growth Towards $500 by 2030 first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

body: Key takeaways NEM price prediction suggests that the coin’s price can increase to the $0.004145 level by the end of 2025. By 2028, NEM may achieve a peak price of $0.011054 with an average price of $0.010363. In 2031, the target price for NEM is between $0.016581 and $0.017962, with an average price of $0.017271. NEM was launched in 2015 to create new economic opportunities through decentralized technologies. The platform provides robust tools for creating smart contracts, digital assets, financial applications, and supply chain management systems. NEM blockchain uses a Proof of Importance (PoI) consensus algorithm that weighs the number of coins a user possesses and the users’ network activity. NEM blockchain’s native token, XEM is used for gas (transaction fees) and network governance. NEM reached a peak price of $2.09 in 2018, but it is currently hovering around $0.016, raising questions about its potential as a good investment. Will NEM recapture $1? How high will NEM go? Let’s get into the technical analysis and NEM price prediction for 2025-2031. Technical indicators give bearish signals, whereby the price charts support the bulls. Is NEM Coin a good investment? Based on the current bearish trend, heightened volatility, and strong selling pressure indicated by technical indicators like the RSI and moving averages, XEM Coin (NEM) may not be considered a favorable investment. Investors should exercise caution due to the uncertain market direction and potential for further price declines in the near term. Why is NEM up? NEM is up after some correction amidst negative market sentiment, as despite negative signals by technical indicators, the market seems unwilling to accept a price below the current price level. Will NEM recover? The recovery of NEM depends on reversing the current NEM sentiment which is bearish and stabilizing market conditions. Watch for signs of decreased selling pressure, potential positive catalysts, and a shift in technical indicators indicating oversold conditions, which could signal a potential recovery in future price movements. Will NEM reach $0.00500? According to the 2026 NEM price predictions, NEM is expected to reach an average price of $0.005757, suggesting it may exceed the $0.005066 mark throughout the year. However, in the best-case scenario, NEM Coin might surpass the $0.006448 mark. Will NEM reach $0.01000? The forecast for 2028 anticipates a peak price of $0.011054, indicating that NEM could potentially surpass the $0.010363 mark during that year, assuming the bullish momentum and positive market conditions persist. Will NEM reach $1? No, market analysts doesn’t expect NEM tokens to reach $1 during the next five years. By 2031, the prediction suggests a maximum price of $0.017962 for NEM, indicating less than one-fourth of the said $1 price. However, this would also depend on sustained growth, market dynamics, and broader adoption factors for market capitalization to increase. Does NEM have a good long-term future? The long term forecast from 2025 to 2031 indicate a generally positive outlook for XEM Coin, with projected growth of double and triple surges in average and maximum prices over the years. NEM’s recent Twitter and Reddit activity has been notably quiet, marked by discussions surrounding technical glitches that have afflicted the network. These posts have failed to generate any significant retweets or engagement, hinting at a lack of community involvement. The subreddit of NEM is also full of spam posts. Source: Cryptopolitan NEM market price prediction: Analysts’ NEM price forecast Firm Name 2025 2026 DigitalCoinPrice $0.00507 $0.00589 Coincodex $0.002505 $0.003298 Cryptopolitan’s NEM price prediction Crypopolitan’s forecast shows that NEM will achieve a high price of $0.004145 near the end of 2025. In 2026, the NEM price will range between $0.005066 and $0.006448. In 2030, the cryptocurrency will range between $0.014278 and $0.015659, with an average price of $0.014969. Professional consultation is suggested, or you can carry out your research. NEM historic price sentiment NEM price history NEM (New Economy Movement) was launched on March 31, 2015. NEM initially had a quiet start, with very low trading volumes and minimal price movement. During its early months and all through 2016, NEM’s price remained under $0.01, often fluctuating within a narrow range. In early 2017, the cryptocurrency market experienced a significant bull run, and NEM’s price began to gain traction. NEM’s price rapidly increased, breaking through the $0.1 mark and reaching new highs. By May 2017, NEM’s price reached around $0.25, showcasing substantial growth over a short period. NEM reached its all-time high of $2.09 on January 4. The cryptocurrency market soon experienced a major correction throughout the remainder of 2018. By the end of 2018, NEM’s price had dropped closer to $0.07, reflecting the broader market downturn. 2019 was a year of relative stability and consolidation for NEM’s price. For most of the year, it hovered around the $0.03 to $0.10 range, with periodic fluctuations in response to market sentiment. In 2020, a mix of positive and negative factors affected NEM’s price. The price fluctuated within the $0.05 to $0.30 range, with occasional spikes due to market news and developments. In early 2021, as the overall cryptocurrency market gained renewed attention, NEM’s price began showing upward movement, reaching about $0.8 in March. However, like many cryptocurrencies, NEM experienced increased volatility during this period, leading to a market price of $0.1261 by December 2021. In 2022 NEM’s price faced consistent downward pressure, as selling pressure outweighed buying interest throughout the year. By mid-2022, NEM’s price had retraced significantly from its previous highs, moving below key support levels to reach $0.039. NEM dipped further to $0.0282 by the end of the year. The bearish sentiment spilled into 2023. For the entire 2023, NEM remained range-bound, trading in a narrow range of $0.0263 and $0.0486. In January 2024, NEM started gaining some traction and reached $0.0500 by the end of the month. Finally, it peaked at $0.0605 in March, which was its highest price since April 2022. In mid-March 2024, NEM started its descent and fell below its support zone at the start of June, dipping to $0.0248. NEM observed further lows in July, with the lowest dip of $0.0122. NEM traded in a range of $0.0140 to $0.0240 from August to October, but it recovered in November with a peak price of $0.0424 at the start of December 2024. In January 2025, NEM was trading near the $0.0275 range and gradually came down to $0.169 by May. NEM went into a free fall by the middle of May and sank to $0.00185 by the middle of June, losing significant value. In late July 2025, NEM volatility decreased significantly, and the token traded in a very narrow range throughout August and September. At the time of writing, NEM is trading at $0.00230, as current sentiment is bearish.

title: Alchemy Pay RWA Platform Unveils Revolutionary Fiat-to-Asset Investment
body: BitcoinWorld Alchemy Pay RWA Platform Unveils Revolutionary Fiat-to-Asset Investment The world of finance is constantly evolving, and a significant new chapter has just begun. Alchemy Pay, a pioneer in crypto payment solutions, has launched its groundbreaking Alchemy Pay RWA platform . This innovative platform is set to transform how everyday investors access real-world assets by bridging the gap between traditional fiat currencies and tokenized investments. Imagine investing in properties, art, or commodities directly from your bank account – this is the future Alchemy Pay is making a reality, notably through its integration with xStocks, Kraken’s tokenized stock platform. What Exactly is the Alchemy Pay RWA Platform? At its core, the Alchemy Pay RWA platform is designed to simplify investing in Real World Assets (RWAs). But what exactly are RWAs? Simply put, they are tangible assets like real estate, fine art, commodities, or even intellectual property that are tokenized, meaning their ownership is represented on a blockchain. This process transforms illiquid assets into digital tokens, making them more accessible and divisible. Alchemy Pay’s new platform acts as a crucial gateway. It allows users to convert their fiat money (like USD, EUR, or GBP) directly into these tokenized RWAs. This removes the complexities often associated with traditional crypto exchanges, offering a streamlined investment experience for a broader audience. The integration with xStocks, a platform powered by Kraken, further enhances its appeal by offering a range of tokenized stocks. Why is the Alchemy Pay RWA Platform a Game-Changer for Investors? This new development by Alchemy Pay brings several compelling benefits to the investment landscape, truly making it a game-changer: Unprecedented Accessibility: Previously, investing in high-value assets like commercial real estate or exclusive art was reserved for institutions or the ultra-wealthy. The Alchemy Pay RWA platform democratizes access, allowing anyone to participate. Fractional Ownership: Tokenization enables fractional ownership. Instead of buying an entire property, you can own a small, affordable portion of it. This significantly lowers the entry barrier for many aspiring investors. Enhanced Liquidity: Traditional real-world assets can be illiquid, meaning they are hard to sell quickly. Tokenization on a blockchain can improve liquidity, making it easier for investors to buy and sell their fractional holdings. Transparency and Security: Blockchain technology provides an immutable record of ownership, enhancing transparency and reducing the risk of fraud compared to traditional asset management. Moreover, the ability to use fiat directly eliminates the need for users to first acquire cryptocurrency, simplifying the entire investment journey and attracting a wider demographic. Navigating the New Frontier: Opportunities and Considerations for the Alchemy Pay RWA Platform While the opportunities presented by the Alchemy Pay RWA platform are vast, it is also important for investors to consider the evolving nature of this new frontier. The platform opens doors to a diverse range of assets, potentially offering new avenues for portfolio diversification beyond traditional stocks and bonds. However, as with any emerging technology, understanding the underlying risks is crucial. These may include: Regulatory Landscape: The regulatory environment for tokenized assets is still developing globally. Changes could impact the platform’s operations or the value of the assets. Market Volatility: While RWAs are tied to tangible assets, their tokenized forms can still be influenced by cryptocurrency market sentiment and overall economic conditions. Platform Security: Users should always exercise due diligence regarding the security measures of any investment platform. Alchemy Pay’s established reputation in the crypto payment space provides a degree of assurance, but vigilance is always recommended. Engaging with the Alchemy Pay RWA platform requires a balanced perspective, acknowledging both its innovative potential and the inherent considerations of a nascent market. The launch of the Alchemy Pay RWA platform marks a significant milestone in the convergence of traditional finance and blockchain technology. By simplifying the process of investing in real-world assets using fiat currency, Alchemy Pay is not just offering a new product; it is helping to redefine investment accessibility for a global audience. This initiative, bolstered by its link to Kraken’s xStocks, positions Alchemy Pay at the forefront of a financial revolution, promising a more inclusive and efficient future for asset ownership. It’s an exciting time to watch how this platform will empower investors worldwide. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Here are some common questions about Alchemy Pay’s new RWA investment platform: Q1: What does RWA stand for? A1: RWA stands for Real World Asset. These are tangible assets like real estate, art, or commodities that are tokenized and represented on a blockchain. Q2: How does Alchemy Pay make RWA investing easier? A2: The Alchemy Pay RWA platform allows users to directly invest in tokenized real-world assets using fiat currencies (like USD or EUR), eliminating the need to first acquire cryptocurrency. Q3: Is the Alchemy Pay RWA platform linked to any major exchanges? A3: Yes, the platform is linked with xStocks, which is Kraken’s tokenized stock platform, providing access to a range of tokenized stock offerings. Q4: What are the main benefits of investing in tokenized RWAs? A4: Key benefits include increased accessibility, fractional ownership (allowing smaller investments), enhanced liquidity compared to traditional assets, and the transparency and security offered by blockchain technology. Q5: Are there any risks associated with RWA investments? A5: Yes, like any investment, risks exist. These can include evolving regulatory landscapes, potential market volatility for tokenized assets, and general platform security considerations. It’s important to conduct your own research. Did you find this article insightful? Share your thoughts and spread the word about this exciting development in the world of RWA investing! Follow Alchemy Pay’s journey and help others discover the potential of tokenized assets by sharing this article on your social media platforms. To learn more about the latest explore our article on key developments shaping the crypto market institutional adoption. This post Alchemy Pay RWA Platform Unveils Revolutionary Fiat-to-Asset Investment first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: BlackRock just bought over $600 million of these 2 cryptocurrencies
body: BlackRock , the world’s biggest asset manager, is doubling down on crypto . On Tuesday, September 16, 2025, the company purchased more than $620 million worth of Bitcoin ( BTC ) and Ethereum (ETH) in a single day. Data shows that BlackRock added 2,270 BTC, worth about $262.7 million, and 78,922 ETH, worth $357.4 million. This brings its total Bitcoin stash to more than 757,000 BTC, valued at $87.23 billion, and Ethereum holdings to 3.68 million ETH, valued at $16.95 billion. According to analyst Thomas Fahrer, BlackRock now controls 762,000 BTC through its iShares Bitcoin Trust (IBIT). A chart of IBIT flows shows how quickly BlackRock has been stacking Bitcoin since the fund launched. Blackrock Buys 2270 Bitcoin Now Holds 762,000 BTC Can you see where this is going? pic.twitter.com/jc3prP3mZn — Thomas Fahrer (@thomas_fahrer) September 16, 2025 From early 2024 through mid-September 2025, IBIT’s Bitcoin holdings surged from under 100,000 BTC to more than 751,000 BTC, making it one of the largest accumulators in history. Total BlackRock crypto portfolio According to Arkham data, the company’s total crypto portfolio jumped from $99.88 billion on September 9 to $104.18 billion on September 16, a one-week increase of $4.31 billion. Most of that came from gains in Bitcoin and Ethereum. BTC rose by nearly $4,000 (+3.59%) in the week, adding $3.66 billion in value to BlackRock’s position, while ETH climbed about $292 (+6.78%), adding $645 million. BlackRock crypto portfolio. Source: Arkham One surprising detail is that while Ethereum’s dollar value grew, the number of ETH in BlackRock’s wallets actually fell by nearly 100,000 tokens during the same period. This drop in token count, combined with the higher price, highlights how volatile institutional trading activity can appear on-chain. Overall, BlackRock’s move adds to the growing narrative of Wall Street giants cementing their dominance in digital assets. With Bitcoin and Ethereum still the top two cryptocurrencies by market value, the company’s aggressive buying shows that large financial players continue to see long-term potential. The post BlackRock just bought over $600 million of these 2 cryptocurrencies appeared first on Finbold .

title: Bitcoin Price Analysis: BTC Bulls Push for a Rally as Risks Remain
body: Bitcoin continues to hover within a consolidation phase after its strong rebound from the $107K zone. While signs of bullish momentum are emerging, the next move will largely depend on whether the price can break through nearby liquidity levels or face rejection and pull back for renewed accumulation. Technical Analysis By Shayan The Daily Chart On the daily timeframe, BTC is trading inside a well-defined range between $107K support and $123K resistance. The recent influx of buyers at the lower boundary fueled a sharp rebound, allowing the asset to reclaim the 100-day moving average and advance toward the range high. This structure reflects renewed demand, as participants defend key supports. The decisive trigger now lies at the $123K upper boundary. A breakout above this level would not only mark a new all-time high but also confirm bullish continuation for the broader trend. The 4-Hour Chart Zooming into the 4-hour chart, Bitcoin has rallied close to the $117K swing high, where notable buy-side liquidity is positioned just above. While the bullish structure remains intact, a short pullback into the decision-point demand zone at $110.7K–$113.1K cannot be ruled out. This area has previously attracted strong buying interest, and a successful retest would reinforce the bullish case. If buyers defend this zone and reclaim momentum, the liquidity above the swing high could act as a magnet, potentially fueling a continuation move toward higher levels. On-chain Analysis By Shayan The 1-week Bitcoin liquidation heatmap highlights a dense cluster of liquidations sitting just above the recent swing high, aligning with the liquidity discussed in the 4-hour chart. Markets often accelerate into such zones, as stop orders and forced liquidations amplify momentum. A clean push through the swing high would likely trigger this cascade, forcing shorts to cover and driving price higher. This reinforces the outlined scenario: while a brief pullback into demand remains possible, the path of least resistance increasingly points toward liquidity absorption above the swing high, a setup that could serve as a catalyst for continuation toward new highs. The post Bitcoin Price Analysis: BTC Bulls Push for a Rally as Risks Remain appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Ripple (XRP) News Today: September 16th
body: ETF updates, a multi-million dollar investment, and the recent performance of XRP. These are the main topics we will touch upon in the following lines. Spot XRP ETF Coming This Week Perhaps the most important news surrounding Ripple and its native token is the upcoming launch of an exchange-traded fund with XRP as the underlying token. The issuer of the product, REX-Osprey, described the investment vehicle as the first spot XRP ETF in the US, but the popular journalist Eleanor Terrett provided more details about it. She claimed the product will operate as a “spot ETF with extras” and will hold XRP tokens, cash, Treasuries, and some derivatives. Bloomberg’s Eric Balchunas recently said the ETF (with the ticker XRPR) is scheduled to go live on September 18 . Other spot XRP ETFs, though, continue to face setbacks. Earlier this month, the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) extended the review period for the product filed by Franklin Templeton for another 60 days, which means that the new decision deadline is November 14, 2025. Ripple’s Multi-Million Donation On September 15, the company disclosed a $25 million investment in Accion Opportunity Fund and Hire Heroes USA. The funding, delivered in RLUSD, aims to expand access to capital for small business owners and create more career opportunities for veterans and military spouses. “It will also equip entrepreneurs with digital payment tools so communities across the US can thrive in today’s rapidly evolving economy. This marks Ripple’s second $25 million donation this year, underscoring the company’s ongoing commitment to giving back and expanding economic opportunity,” the announcement reads. Brad Garlinghouse, CEO of Ripple, said small businesses and veterans are two of “the most powerful engines of American progress, yet both face barriers that limit their full economic impact.” The crypto firm announced the news on its X account, claiming that this funding highlights how stablecoins can drive real-world impact. RLUSD is a USD-pegged stablecoin launched by Ripple towards the end of 2024. Over the past several months, it has undergone some serious progress, and currently, its market capitalization is approximately $730 million. XRP Returns to Green Territory Probably driven by the hype surrounding the launch of the REX-Osprey XRP ETF, the price of Ripple’s native cryptocurrency has reclaimed the $3 mark and currently trades at $3.04 (per CoinGecko’s data). X user CRYPTOWZRD recently suggested that the asset may experience an “impulsive bullish move” should it clear the $3.1320 resistance target. At the same time, Ali Martinez warned that $2.80 is the most important support level. Meanwhile, the amount of XRP coins stored on leading crypto exchanges continues to rise, signaling an increased selling pressure. Currently, over 3.6 billion tokens are held on Binance alone, representing the highest level ever. The post Ripple (XRP) News Today: September 16th appeared first on CryptoPotato .
